item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebookâ€™s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.
